description: This file defines a RecyclerView adapter, HorizontalRailAdapter, used to display a horizontal list of TV content items with image and title. It handles focus changes for TV navigation and click events for each item.

classes.name: HorizontalRailAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView adapter for displaying a horizontal list of content items, managing item views, focus scaling, and click callbacks.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates the item layout and creates a ViewHolder.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds content item data to the ViewHolder and sets click listener.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of items.

classes.name: VH
classes.description: Inner class ViewHolder for item view. Handles focus animations.

methods.name: HorizontalRailAdapter
methods.description: Constructor for the adapter, initializes item list, layout resource, and click callback.
